items.summary: In frontend/src/App.tsx, update ONLY the Hero section logo element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] so that it exactly uses src="/assets/Gadget Zone-Logo-1.png" and has className="h-24 md:h-32 mx-auto mb-6". Do not change any other attributes of this element (e.g., alt) and do not change any other elements, layout, text, buttons, styling, or sections.
